tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
  factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  factor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  parent_factor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (parent_factor_id) REFERENCES RiskFactors(factor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Dependencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_factor_id INT,
    dependent_risk_factor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (risk_factor_id) REFERENCES RiskFactors(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dependent_risk_factor_id) REFERENCES RiskFactors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE factor_relations (
  relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  factor_id1 INT,
  factor_id2 INT,
  relation_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (factor_id1) REFERENCES risk_factors(factor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (factor_id2) REFERENCES risk_factors(factor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RiskRelationships (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    factor_id INT,
    type_id INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (factor_id) REFERENCES RiskFactors(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES RiskType(type_id)
);
